lyric.verse: Omochabako ketobashita heya ni Ukanderu MELODY akai ORUGOORU Gin-iro de kiniro te ni irete Maru de sekai no yami wo kiaru mane wo shite
lyric.chorus: Aa, onaji sora no mukoo de
lyric.verse: Shiawase to ui kotoba no imi wo Tada kurashite tadake no hito wo koroshiteru
lyric.chorus: Aa, yugann da yume ni furu ame Sore wa kareru no namida Aa, shiranai koe ni sotto futa wo shita mo
lyric.verse: Toozakaru sora ni mekakushi wo shite Kan JYUUSU wo katte sukima wo umeteku Hane no mekeochita tori no tame ni, Aa Nagasu namida sae mo kodomo kara ubatteru
lyric.chorus: Itsu made mo (aa) tsutzukanai yo konna ooki na uso wa
lyric.verse: Wakamono wa iku michi ga kurasugide Kokoro mo nesumarete eda wo sagashiteru Jibun no inochi wo burasageru eda wo Eda wo sagshiteru
